ringofmagicaldeflection.label: Ring of Magical Deflection
ringofmagicaldeflection.desc: A simple yet pretty silver ring. You feel an aura of protection when wearing it.

dagger.label: Dagger
dagger.desc: An old, plain dagger. Does 1d4+STR piercing damage.

staff.label: Staff
staff.desc: An old, plain wooden staff. Does 1d8+STR blunt damage.

rapier.label: Rapier
rapier.desc: An old, plain rapier. Does 1d6+STR piercing damage.

shortsword.label: Short Sword
shortsword.desc: An old, plain short sword. Does 1d6+STR slashing damage.

mace.label: Mace
mace.desc: An old, plain mace. Does 1d6+STR blunt damage.

longsword.label: Long Sword
longsword.desc: An old, plain long sword. Does 1d8+STR slashing damage.

warhammer.label: Warhammer
warhammer.desc: An old, plain warhammer. Does 1d8+STR blunt damage.

spear.label: Spear
spear.desc: An old, plain spear. Does 1d8+STR piercing damage.

bastardsword.label: Bastard Sword
bastardsword.desc: An old, plain bastard sword. Does 1d10+STR slashing damage.

shortbow.label: Short Bow
shortbow.desc: An old, plain short bow. Does 1d6+(STR+AGI)/2 damage and has 6 range.

longbow.label: Long Bow
longbow.desc: An old, plain long bow. Does 1d8+(STR+AGI)/2 damage and has 10 range.

compoundbow.label: Compound Bow
compoundbow.desc: An old, plain compound bow. Does 1d10+(STR+AGI)/2 damage and has 10 range.

magicstaffarcane.label: Magic Staff (Arcane)
magicstaffarcane.desc: An old, plain staff. Does 1d6+INT arcane damage and has 10 range.

lockpick.label: Lockpick
lockpick.desc: An old, plain lockpick. Enables the holder to attempt to pick a lock.
